x_symbol.description: Center a positioned element within the current client window space. If w,h not specified, then the existing width and height of e are used.

par.name: e
par.note: An existing absolutely positioned dom element (or an id to such an element).

par.name: w
par.note: Width to resize element to. Optional, integer.

par.name: h
par.note: Height to resize element to. Optional, integer.
